WorkItem.ClosedComment: This has been asked several times, please search for existing issues.Mark the item as Unique and it won't use it in both slots.
WorkItem.Description: I am a fury warrior with titan grip.  Any time I use the optimization tool Rawr recommends I equip the same weapon in each hand rather than utilizing my two best weapons.  Is there a way to indicate that I only have one of each weapon?
